question.text: A genetic engineer upon the completion of electrophoresis, moves ahead to elution. What is exactly done by him in this step?

options.text: The separated band from DNA is exposed to UV radiations.
The separated band from DNA are cut out from the gel and extracted from the gel piece
Separation of the recombinant protein from recombinant cell.
The separated band from DNA fragment can be visualized by ethidium bromide.

solution.text: After the completion gel electrophoresis, the DNA sequence needs to amplified by PCR. To obtain the DNA sequence from the gel, the separated bands are cut and then the sequence is extracted. This process is called as elution.
